Hey,

I’ve just started creating an app (mostly for myself) to have a quick overview of the dailies and some basic information about my recent trading post history etc.

However, I’m getting extra results from the achievements/daily endpoint. I’m getting id 1938 (Daily Ascalon Vista Viewer) and 1951 (Daily Metrica Provice Event Completer) which both aren’t dailies as I’ve checked in game.

Is this related to the current wintersday event and their dailies?

Also, I saw a couple of tools / websites that knew the current recommended daily fractal scales (4 and 25 for today, december 30th). Which is something I really like to know when I’m on my way home so I can hit up some guildies to start making a party for them.

Is there a way to get the daily recommended fractal scales via the API as well?
